mapper.select: SELECT r.RESIDX, r.RESNAME, r.RESRUN, r.RESNUM, r.TYPEIDX, r.RESCLEANSCORE, r.ADDRGU, r.ADDRDONG, r.OLDADDR, r.NEWADDR, r.NUMADDR, r.XPOS, r.YPOS, true AS ISBEST, b.RESMAINDISH, b.BESTREGYEAR FROM RESTAURANT r INNER JOIN BESTRESTAURANT b ON r.RESIDX = b.RESIDX

SELECT r.RESIDX, r.RESNAME, r.RESRUN, r.RESNUM, r.TYPEIDX, r.RESCLEANSCORE, r.ADDRGU, r.ADDRDONG, r.OLDADDR, r.NEWADDR, r.NUMADDR, r.XPOS, r.YPOS, true AS ISBEST, b.RESMAINDISH, b.BESTREGYEAR FROM RESTAURANT r INNER JOIN BESTRESTAURANT b ON r.RESIDX = b.RESIDX WHERE r.RESIDX = #{RESIDX}
